title: Chicken & Potato Rice
instructions: Heat oil in a large pot. Add onions and saut√© until golden.
Add chicken pieces and brown on all sides.
Stir in tomatoes and cook until they soften into a sauce.
Sprinkle in curry powder, turmeric, black pepper, and salt. Mix to coat everything.
Add rice and stir to combine with the mixture.
Pour in water or stock, bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low.
Cover and cook for about 20 minutes, or until rice and potatoes are tender.
Fluff rice with a fork and serve hot.
